metadata.title: CVE-2021-3710 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An information disclosure via path traversal was discovered in apport/hookutils.py function read_file(). This issue affects: apport 2.14.1 versions prior to 2.14.1-0ubuntu3.29+esm8; 2.20.1 versions prior to 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.30+esm2; 2.20.9 versions prior to 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.26; 2.20.11 versions prior to 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.20; 2.20.11 versions prior to 2.20.11-0ubuntu65.3;

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-3710` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

apport - 2.20.11-0ubuntu69
apport-gtk - 2.20.11-0ubuntu69
apport-kde - 2.20.11-0ubuntu69
apport-noui - 2.20.11-0ubuntu69
apport-retrace - 2.20.11-0ubuntu69
apport-valgrind - 2.20.11-0ubuntu69
dh-apport - 2.20.11-0ubuntu69
python3-apport - 2.20.11-0ubuntu69
python3-problem-report - 2.20.11-0ubuntu69
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apport package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.20.11-0ubuntu69').
